mapper.sql: select (row_number() over(order by reward_category,reward_id )), * from tb_reward
mapper.insert: insert into tb_reward (reward_name, reward_desc, reward_price, reward_stock, reward_category, prdt_id) VALUES (#{reward_name}, #{reward_desc}, #{reward_price}, #{reward_stock}, #{reward_category}, #{prdt_id})
mapper.update: update tb_reward set reward_name = #{reward_name}, reward_price = #{reward_price}, reward_desc = #{reward_desc}, reward_stock = #{reward_stock}, reward_category = #{reward_category} WHERE reward_id = #{reward_id}
update into tb_reward set reward_id=#{no_arr}, reward_cnt=#{cnt_arr}

update tb_reward set reward_stock = case when #{reward_stock} = -1 then -1 when #{reward_stock}-#{reward_user_cnt} >= 0 then #{reward_stock} - #{reward_user_cnt} end where reward_id = #{reward_id} and prdt_id = #{prdt_id}
